body:
I don't know if a post was made about this so i am going to say it here.  What happened to OiTC? I noticed that it got taken out of avicade.

I am currently making a map for it, so i hope that it won't go!

title: One in the Chamber

replies.body: It would be switched to in the rots, then Avicade would crash. It was a huge bug.
